properties.entry: select empId, empName, empNo, email, phone, deptCode, jobCode, salLevel, salary, bonus, managerId, hireDate, entDate, entYn from employee
insert into employee ( empId, empName, empNo, email, phone, deptCode, jobCode, salLevel, salary, bonus, managerId, hireDate, entDate, entYn ) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
update employee set empId = ?, set empName = ?, where menu_code = ?
